features.title: Collect and Display Testimonials
features.subtitle: All in one solution
features.description: Create a dedicated landing page for your business. Share the page link easily via email, social media, or SMS. Setup can be done in two minutes.

features.title: Easy to Manage
features.subtitle: A dashboard to manage all testimonials
features.description: You will have a simple & clean dashboard to manage all testimonials in one place. It's like your email inbox, but designed for your social proof!

features.title: More Social Proof
features.subtitle: Not only text and video testimonials
features.description: Manage testimonials from social media, video platforms, and review sites in a single place!

features.title: Embed the Wall of Love
features.subtitle: The best testimonials all in one place
features.description: Showcase all your favorite testimonials. Embed it on your website in under a minute with no coding knowledge required!

features.title: Track the Metrics
features.subtitle: Understand how video testimonials are performing
features.description: Track metrics from all embedded videos, help your marketing team understand performance, and promote the best-performing videos.

hero.title: Welcome to TrueVoices
hero.subtitle: Collect and showcase authentic testimonials from your customers with ease.
hero.paragraph1: Your customers‚Äô voices are your most powerful marketing tool. With TrueVoices, you can effortlessly collect, manage, and embed testimonials‚Äîno coding required.
hero.paragraph2: Build trust and credibility through genuine feedback from satisfied customers. Set up your testimonial page in minutes and watch your brand thrive!
